Prepare Month 1 2015/16 Payroll

Delete Month 1 Payroll
Run & Report Month 1 Payroll
Run Month 1 Payroll

Please check your Company Details before you Run & Report Month 1 Payroll.

HMRC will require your PAYE Reference and Accounts Office Reference as part of your RTI submission.

Learn more about setting up Payroll â

  1. Enter the date you will pay your staff

    Show calendar

    You must report your payroll to HMRC on or before your payday, otherwise it is considered late.
    Dates between 06 Apr 15 and 05 May 15 are valid for this pay period.

  2. Review and edit payslips

    Review and edit the payslips for all employees in this month's Payroll. To add an employee you need to create a payroll profile for them.

    Name Total Pay Tax Employee NI Other Deductions Net Pay Employer NI
    Ed Molyneux Â£1,000.00 Â£42.40 Â£39.36 Â£0.00 Â£918.24 Â£44.71 Edit Payslip
    Â£1,000.00 Â£42.40 Â£39.36 Â£0.00 Â£918.24 Â£44.71

  3. Double-check everything

    Make sure that you have chosen the correct date, that all employees you need to pay are included in your Payroll and that all employee details are correct.

    On the Payroll Profiles

    • Employee leaving dates
    • Tax code and student loan
    • Childcare vouchers and other benefits

    On the Payslips

    • Bonuses, commission and deductions
    • Sick pay, maternity, paternity, and adoption pay
    • Pension contributions
  4. Run & Report Month 1 Payroll Run Month 1 Payroll
    Are you sure you don't need to file RTI?
    You wonât be able to edit payslips after running your payroll.
    Your Government Gateway login details are required to report details of this pay period to HMRC.
